name: Coffee Brakes
description:
Have a blast jousting up to four of your fellow players in this goofy party game!

THE BATTLE
Hop on a chair and battle your friends in a variety of unique levels. Wind up your joust and then slam into your friends, jousting them off of their chairs taking them down!

GAME MODES
When you're not too focused on slamming into your fellow colleague, play through different game modes such as King of The Hill & Hot Potato where you change up the rules of winning to enjoy a spicy variety of gameplay!

COUCH & ONLINE PLAY
Perfect for a party session or a relax at home with friends with Local Multiplayer and Online Support!

DEATHLY OFFICE IMPLEMENTS
Grab fun items that have a variety of deadly consequences for your fellow co-worker

RISING TO THE TOP
Play around in 6 different fun levels as you slowly rise through the office building, fighting your companions as you go

OFFICE ATTIRE
Customize your appearance in the office lobby wardrobe with silly little hats, colors and different weapons before the round begins!
